title: U.S. GEOTHERMAL INC. SHAREHOLDER ALERT: Rigrodsky & Long, P.A. Announces Investigation of Buyout
text:
WILMINGTON, Del.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Rigrodsky & Long, P.A.:
Do you own shares of U.S. Geothermal Inc. (NYSE AMERICAN: HTM )? Did you purchase any of your shares prior to January 24, 2018? Do you think the proposed buyout is fair? Do you want to discuss your rights?
Rigrodsky & Long, P.A. announces that it is investigating potential legal claims against the board of directors of U.S. Geothermal Inc. (“U.S Geothermal” or the “Company”) (NYSE AMERICAN: HTM ) regarding possible breaches of fiduciary duties and other violations of law related to the Company’s entry into an agreement to be acquired by Ormat Technologies, Inc. (“Ormat”) (NYSE: ORA ). Under the terms of the agreement, shareholders of U.S. Geothermal will receive $5.45 in cash for each share of U.S. Geothermal common stock.
If you own common stock of U.S. Geothermal and purchased any shares before January 24, 2018, if you would like to learn more about this investigation, or if you have any questions concerning this announcement or your rights or interests, please contact Seth D. Rigrodsky or Gina M. Serra at Rigrodsky & Long, P.A., 2 Righter Parkway, Suite 120, Wilmington, DE 19803, by telephone at (888) 969-4242, or by e-mail at info@rl-legal.com .
Rigrodsky & Long, P.A. , with offices in Wilmington, Delaware and Garden City, New York, regularly prosecutes securities fraud, shareholder corporate, and shareholder derivative litigation on behalf of shareholders in state and federal courts throughout the United States.
